title: Hextech repair tool gave me a virus
body: a few days ago i downloaded the hextech repair tool because i thought it would help me figure out why my client wasn't putting me in game. i used it but it said it needed admin privileges to be able to diagnose things like me computers connection. so when i went to give it admin it the programs folder, my screen went black and reset my desktop with everything still opened. I tried opening it again and the same thing happened. my friend said  that i probably got a virus from downloading it and so i had to uninstall it. Riot pls respond to help me solve this problem i just want to play the game.

replies.body: sorry ima bit late reply, but i actually forgot about this problem i had. i believe you are right in that it didnt give me a virus. However i fixed the issues id been having with connecting to the servers. turns out i just need to move closer to our second router since my signal was ciming from there. sorry if i wasted any valueable time

If you grabbed the Hextech Repair Tool from our site, it's *extremely unlikely* to have given you a virus. It sounds like your PC may have just hung up on giving you a prompt that allowed you to grant or deny the HRT admin access. 

If you can give me a bit more details on what issues you're having with League, I can suggest steps to take.
